name: Chrom
description: A prince of Ylisse and descendant of the Hero-King. Dressed to celebrate the spring festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.
insights: Chrom is the only hero with Carrot Axe+.
Chrom is the only hero with Carrot Axe.
Chrom is the only hero with Axe Experience 3.
Chrom is the only hero with Axe Experience 2.
Chrom is the only hero with Axe Experience 1.

dialogue.text: I'm Chrom, Prince of the Halidom of Ylisse. Enjoying the spring festival? I've dressed for the occasion!
Anna wants to master painting eggs for the spring festival. No doubt she wants to sell them.
We were right in the middle of celebrating the arrival of spring when I was summoned. Had I known I would be plucked from our castle like that, I would have come...better prepared.
On patrol, <Player Name>? I know that this time of year can put a spring in our steps. Just remember that if you get tired, I'll take my turn.
We have a custom of painting eggs during our spring festival. But I have a habit of crushing the eggs I make.
I have to take special care with my, er, weapon here. It chips easily. Hmm...I miss Falchion.
Greetings from <Friend Name>. Do you enjoy the spring season, <Player Name>? I do!
Ha! The spirit of spring moves through me.
In the spirit of spring, I will grow stronger!
I'm not living up to the whole idea of spring growth here.
Whatever you did there is making this costume fit me better!

Ah, if it isn't <Player Name>! I just finished painting some spring-festival eggs. Not bad, if I say so myself. Take a look. What? Curious what all that lettering is? It's written in the language of Ylisse. It's a bit of a poem, I guess, that says how much I value your presence here. And see? On this side, I've painted a picture of you. Good likeness, don't you think? What, it isn't? Well, I tried, and at least now you know that I truly do value our strong bond. Now, may we spend many spring festivals together and...I promise to work on my painting skills.
